title: Hired gun greaves
body: Hey. I have played Hired gun greaves two times now, and i have noticed that his gun does'nt connect with the barrel. Is that supposed to be like that or is it a bug?

replies.body:
i think you mean "graves" {{champion:104}} 

"greaves" are a type of boot..
Not sure if this is a gameplay issue. I think it's more fit for the Art & Sound board, more likely to get an answer there.
